Public NotInheritable Class AudioConfig Implements IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents audio input configuration used for specifying what type of input to use (microphone, file, stream).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioConfig FromStreamInput (Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioInputStream audioStream);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioConfig FromStreamInput(class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioInputStream audioStream) cil managed

static member FromStreamInput : Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioInputStream -> Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Audio.AudioConfig

Docs.param: Specifies the custom audio input stream.
Docs.summary: Creates an AudioConfig object representing the specified stream. Currently, only WAV / PCM with 16-bit samples, 16 kHz sample rate, and a single channel (Mono) is supported. When used with the Conversation Transcription Service, eight channels are supported.
Docs.returns: The audio input configuration being created.

Docs.param: Specifies the pull audio input stream callback.

Docs.summary: Creates an AudioConfig object representing the specified stream. Currently, only WAV / PCM with 16-bit samples, 16 kHz sample rate, and a single channel (Mono) is supported. When used with the Conversation Transcription Service, eight channels are supported.
Docs.returns: The audio input configuration being created.
